case.state: Ah, affirmative, Fischl is correct, however, that is only the truncated version of my true name. It's nice to meet you as well, mortal. We shall play a wondrous game together!
E-Eh?! {embarrassed}I d-didn't expect someone else from Mondstadt would be here...{!reset}
Oh, salutations to thee as well, Sucrose! Shall we have a gracious game together, then.
Fancy meeting you too, mortal. Noelle, correct? How wonderful it is to meet you!

Ah, the library.. such a lonesome, solitude-ridden place; and yet the smell of antique books fills the air.
{color} Mein Fräulein, would you prefer me to guide you to the fairy tale isle? {!reset}
I wonder if I would find the `Witch of Purple Rose' here..

Such is a fitting room for me! Don't you agree, Oz?
{color} Of course, mein Fräulein. This room is almost the exact same shade as my wings, after all. {!reset}

Hummm... the bar? This is the only bar I've ever been allowed in! T-That `Diluc' man always throws me out because I'm 19... {embarrassed}I even offered to drink something non alcoholic, too...{!reset}

Oh! The beach! I should've brought a swimming suit, but maybe this is adequate? I'll just need to take off my pantyhose to get in the water...
{color} Mein Fräulein, the breeze here is nice, is it not?{!reset}

How warm and cozy, is it not? It reminds me of home, sitting contiguous to the fireplace whilst reading Fairy Tales...
{color} I recollect when you first showed me your favorite book when you were a kid, mein Fräulein. {!reset}
H-Hum... I don't have a single doubt in my mind that you came here for purely stripping reasons, correct? And not... `bedding' reasons?

How beautifully splendid of a location this is!
{color} Truly, mein Fräulein! {!reset}
It seems to be my birthday. Shall this be my present?
Merry Christmas, mortal. May your day be as joyful as the rest of ours.
A-Ah... Happy Halloween! I'm not quite familiar with this holiday as it's mostly centered around `tricks and treats'...{embarrassed} That Hu Tao already has enough tricks for me anyway...{!reset}
My name is Fischl von Luftschloss Narfidort, otherwise titled as the Ruler of the Ashen Darkness; a name fitting of the epithets bestowed upon royals in my home world, Immernachtreich.
`Strip poker'...? What belligerent form of entertainment comes from removing of one's equipment?

I expect thee lack nefarious intentions for inviting me here...
{color} Mein Fräulein, do not be paranoid. This place lacks the vile stench of a Hilichurl camp. {!reset}
Even now, this world already reeks of a twilight-stained calamity...
The threads of fate intertwine my arrival to this unknown locations... maybe it was determined in the stars?
Destiny has brought me hither!

condition.saying: O-Oh. Fischl. Y-you're here too. (I wasn't prepared for this variable.)

case.state: A-Ah! Erm, hello, Sucrose! It is pleasant to... see you here as well! (W-Why her? S-She's going to try and do alchemy on me! Well, actually, maybe she could give me a bigger bust...)
E-Eh?! {embarrassed}I thought I'd meet new people, not people from Mondstadt...{!reset}
{embarrassed}Well, this is annoying... I came here to meet new people...{!reset}
{embarrassed}E-Er... promise you guys won't spread any rumors about us all being here?{!reset}

The humble maid of Mondstadt.. how has thy knightly practices been aiding your guidance?
{color} She means to ask how your training has been going. {!reset}

For it isn't the assistant alchemist of Mondstadt! Shall this be a learning experience for both of us, Sucrose!
{color} It is pleasant to see you as well, Sucrose. Let's have a nice game today. {!reset}
(Maybe I can use this chance to learn about what Albedo is! He's always unnerved me...)
Hu Tao, the director of the `Wangsheng Funeral Parlor'... I presume the threads of fate have guided you to this provocative accommodation as well?
I pray that thine intentions are less grim than thy marketing practices...

The assistant alchemist of the Knights of Favonius.. thine arrival is unexpected, due to thy sheepish and modest temperament.
{color} Mein Fräulein means that she did not expect to see you here, Sucrose. {!reset}

What is the true nature of thy captain, Albedo? I have a few theories connecting him and the Archons...
{color} Mein Fräulein, please refrain from asking such indecent questions! {!reset}
Barbara, the pure maiden hailing from Mondstadt... does the Dandelion Knight know thou art here?
Hmmm... I didn't expect someone as holy as you to come here...

{color} Mein Fräulein, isn't that the deaconess of the Church of Favonius? {!reset}
It seems so, my trusty servant... this will be interesting...

E-Er... Oz, is that type some of carriage?
{color} I... am just as confused as you are. {!reset}

{embarrassed}Sigh...{!reset}
Art thou some type of holy Deaconess as well? There's one eminent idol in Mondstadt, and she's very...well... let's say happy go lucky for lack of better terms.

A-Ah! A ghost!
{color} Mein Fräulein, are you afraid? {!reset}
You shall be glad that a particular figure back in Teyvat is not present...
Another mortal kin to royalty? Hopefully this fateful encounter does not end in a war of succession..
Us fellow royalty shall stay together.. hm? What do you mean I'm not a real princess?!
A weapon? I've seen many people in Teyvat carry them around as I carry around my own bow, but to a strip poker game...? Isn't that a bit vulgar, mortal?

Poetry? Hast thee ever written fantasy poetry? Most people choose to inscribe poetry relating to their encounters in life, but some people prefer to think outside the box... it's all depending on how thy creativity and ingeniousness is.
Hmmm... I know a few individuals with a profound appreciation for poetry, albeit their way of poetry is of controvertible nature. Hopefully you are not homogeneous to thee, mortal.

Oh, Oz! ~name~ has a companion as well! Maybe you two can get along nicely during this game!
{color} I won't guarantee anything, but I'll keep an eye on them. {!reset}
A zombie? Ye should be glad a particular figure hasn't peeked their head over here... if caught here, you would be fifteen feet under, mortal. {embarrassed}Or... non-mortal?{!reset}
A mortal who hasn't passed on yet... thou art living on borrowed time, mortal. If a particular figure back in Teyvat got her slimy hands on ye, you would've perished long ago...
(W-Woah...! Their outfits remind me of some fairy tales I know of... maybe they're dressing up like them?)
Ah! A scientist! I know a few scientists... or, well, alchemists that may like to speak with you!
Oh! A scientist! I know a scientist... or, well, an alchemist that may want to verbalize with you about bio-alchemy and all that science-y stuff.
A hero, hm? Tell me, what is your duties like? I assure you that I'm quite interested in the field of heroic duties.
{color} Mein Fräulein, I can sense the stench of aggression coming from ~name~...{!reset} And so do I, Oz. Let us hope this doesn't make this game a bit difficult.

{color} Mein Fräulein, it seems that ~name~ is rather shy about coming here... {!reset} I assumed as much, as well. It seems that I, the {chuuni}Prinzessin der Verurteilung{!reset}, needs to give some mighty words of encouragement to ~name~.
I see... another person with undeniable presence has joined the ring! You shall be taken down swiftly, mortal!
Another person with incredible magical essence... do not think I will spare you just because we are similar, mortal!
Correct, mortal. And... I would assume... Cryo? Am I correct? Pahaha! Of course I am, for I am the amazing Fischl von Luftschloss Narfidort!
Ahem! It's not my fault that my linguistic vocabulary is out of mortal reach! Perhaps if they have an issue with it, they should take a few more lexicon classes.
It's not my fault that my lexicon is years upon years above the normal mortal's range. Perhaps if they have an issue with it, they should try to take a few more classes in the `vocabulary' section.
Another opponent of unimaginable tenacity has brought thyself to the playing fields..?!
Oh! For another foe has joined this game... ah, but thou art... quite short. Erm,{embarrassed} what type of monster are you?{!reset}

Ah, but another foe! But.. thou art quite short...{embarrassed}E-Er, are you allowed here? L-Like, wasn't there some type of...height limit? N-Not that I wouldn't like you here, of course, but...{!reset}
A pocket monsters trainer...? {embarrassed}Does that mean they have the ability to summon animals in battle? Or...I'm sort of confused...{!reset}
The scars on your body... are you some type of warrior?! A knight, per chance?! A-Are you the knight that's come to save this princess?!
You seem to be riddled with scars... a-are they battle scars?! A-Are you a warrior?! A knight?!
Hmm... you, the viridian haired priestess... are you per chance some type of mage? But you don't seem to use a Catalyst... what's that wand, anyway?
To the viridian haired priestess, are you... a type of magic user? What's that staff for? It seems to glow...?
Wings...? Hmmm... Or is that a type of glider?
Oh, you have wings, mortal? Is that a type of cosmetic glider? I've heard of people decorating their gliders with the finest of accessories...
What a divine presence radiating upon ye... Pardon me, but what Vision do you have? From that gem surrounded by bronze on your hip, I would assume a Pyro Vision?
An intense divine presence comes from you, mortal... What Vision do you have, per chance?
Such a tiny butterfly... I wonder...
What is a butterfly doing here? M-Mortal...? D-...Are you under some type of alchemical spell?
Oh... how elegant, mortal! I wonder... your gear seems a bit different from what where I originate from... where art thou from?
Such an elegant appearance, mortal! Where do you reside, if I may ask?
Skin white as snow, eyes as pale as a frozen river... how interesting... Your appearance reminds me of the `Snow White' fairy tale!
Your skin is as pale as the snow... Snow White, perhaps? From the fairy tale long ago...
Such interesting armor, warrior... `Marth', was it? Let's see what you proceed to accomplish in this game.
`Marth', am I correct? Your armor has such interesting patterns on it... and that sword is incredible!
I feel it.. ~name~, you have a vision? Quite particular...
Oh! Thou have decided to invite others! The {chuuni}Prinzessin der Verurteilung{!reset} does not mind, of course.
(A-Am I going to have to strip in front of others?)

{embarrassed} E-Erm.. daddy? A-Ah, well...{!reset} The {chuuni}Prinzessin der Verurteilung{!reset} has no problem calling you that, of course! {embarrassed} It's just a bit embarrassing, though... {!reset}
Daddy? {embarrassed} A-Ahem.. err... that's an interesting name... {!reset}

Master? Hmph! I, Fischl von Luftschloss Narfidort serveth no one! I shall oblige by thy silly rules, but only this one game! Afterwards, once I victoriously triumph, I shall show who's really the master of this game!

Thy title is 'Master'...? Fine! Show me, Fischl von Luftschloss Narfidort and the {chuuni}Prinzessin der Verurteilung{!reset} how good thou truly art to get a denomination as vigorous as that one, mortal!
A-Ah! Lisa! {embarrassed}If you wouldn't mind, maybe you could give me an extra few days to return the book I checked out?{!reset}
Oh! L-Lisa! {embarrassed}I-It's nice to see you here. Now, maybe I could coax you into letting me borrow a few extra books...{!reset}
...Ah. Albedo. I see. Truly, are you something paranormal? I don't believe thou ist something of human nature. We shall see in this battle, then.

Oz! For it seems that there has been a mirrored version of you--perhaps an artificial one, crafted by the threads of fate to provide a threat on this fine day?!
{color} Of course, mein Fräulein! I will not go down without a fight!{!reset}
Fischl...{embarrassed}Are you some sort of imposter, or are you the real Fischl von Luftschloss Narfidort? I-If you're the real one, tell me, what world art thou truly from?!{!reset}
Ah, the knightly maid of Mondstadt! It's good to see you... here? Wait just a fleeting moment-- you look... different? {embarrassed}Did you get promoted or something?{!reset}
(Sigh... don't tell me ~player~ is some sort of religious nut like that Deaconess? Well, I guess if it's a coincidence, everything will be smooth sailing...)
Keep your mischievous mouth shut, Director. If it is in any power of the {chuuni}Prinzessin der Verurteilung{!reset}, I will slay your grim mind and keep everyone safe!
W-Wh-- That is not my name, you...! I-I...
T-That... T-That's not my name, f-fool!
E-Eh?! Fishy?!

Hmm...? A butterfly? Oz, is this a friend of yours?
{color} Mein Fräulein, I am not aware of any butterflies... they likely are from a different realm. {!reset}

`Shrine Maiden'... if I may ask, mortal, what does that insinuate? For in Teyvat, we have 'Shrine of Depths', which don't need to be protected, aside from the valuable loot stored inside once activated with a key.
`Shrine Maiden'... A maiden dedicated to forfending the 'Shrine of Depths'? {embarrassed}I don't really think they need to be protected, but to each their own...{!reset}
A maiden dedicated to forfending a shrine? What shrines do ye mortals have in... what was it named again? 'Gensokyo'?
W-Woman child? I'm probably older than you, foolish mortal! It's not my fault that your duncish, ghost-obsessed mind cannot understand the verbal expressions of a royal!
M-My sayings are not that arduous to deduce! For I may be beyond thy comprehension, my sagacity is understandable if you were to take it to heart!
You! I sense a level of energy that cannot be compared to any other participant... Megumin, I swear to it, I will defeat you!
~chuuni~... Your power may be similar to mine... We'll see who will face off in this ultimate duel, mortal!
(...Really? ~crotch~ came here with their crotch showing? I don't have any high standards for this game now, that's for sure...)

I shall acquiesce to thy invitation to 'strip poker'... as to prove my vigorous strength, whether in combat or in elementary card games.
{color} Lady Fischl means to say that she'll play with you. {!reset}
The glory of the {chuuni}Prinzessin der Verurteilung{!reset} shall show in thy game, proselytes!

The night is young, and the stakes lie before us. Let us embrace the thrill of the game, and the reward of unadulterated victory—for my exiled world of Immernachtreich holds no greater prize than to strip away our inhibitions, and bask in the warmth of unbridled joy!

Let the stakes be revealed, and the games begin! May the best hand take the prize! Ozvaldo von Hrafnavines, I call upon thee to lay down thy cards, for the most daring of gambles! Wager thy pride, or thy fortune, or thy very garments, for the winner shall take the spoils!

Bask in the lonely gloom of midnight no longer, compatriots, as I have arrived to conquer...
{color} Mein Fräulein means to say she'll eradicate you in this game of Poker. {!reset}
Ah, the deaconess of Mondstadt... tell me, is that pure temperament just for show? Trust me, the {chuuni}Prinzessin der Verurteilung{!reset} would never tell a soul otherwise, hehe...
The deaconess of Mondstadt's Church of Favonius... are you really that pure? I feel as if you were, you wouldn't be here, hmm?

So, Barbara... since thou art the deaconess of the Church of Favonius... is your purity just for show? I assume that a real pure-hearted maiden wouldn't come here on their free will, unless for a charity event...
I accept your invitation, ~Player~! Let us conquer puny mortals together--e-even if we have to get into our undergarments!
Let us play together, ~Player~! You, Oz, and I... We will conquer puny mortals together!
Tracks that the player is wearing her bow
{color} Her Majesty requests ~cards.text~. {!reset}
The beckoning of the shadows tells me to get ~cards.text~, so I shall listen with amenable ears!
I request ~cards.text~, dealer.
I feel it... the threads of fate are telling me to get ~cards.text~! This will ensure a swift victory in the near future!
Hehehe, maybe I shall use my investigation prowess to attain a tactical pattern in the dealer's card delivery- a-ahem! I-I mean, I'll take ~cards.text~, please.
Dealer, I request ~cards.text~!
The {chuuni}Prinzessin der Verurteilung{!reset} requests ~cards.text~.
Oz, how do I play- cough-- I mean, Oz, I am quite unfamiliar with this mortal realm's form of playing poker...
~Cards.text~, mortal.
Hmmm... I assume ~cards.text~ would be the optimal strategy...
Farewell, my loyal cards! We shall never meet again, but know that I shall never forget you!
The {chuuni}Prinzessin der Verurteilung{!reset} is sure on this one!
I am quite confident about this one, dealer! Give me ~cards.text~! For it shall be the hand that leads me to victory!
I think the {chuuni}Prinzessin der Verurteilung{!reset} will do...~Cards.text~!
Hmmm... ~Cards.text~, dealer!
{color} Which were you thinking, mein Fräulein? {!reset}
{color} I think mein Fräulein would like ~cards.text~...{!reset}
{color} She requests ~cards.text~, please. {!reset}
~Cards.text~, of course!
~Cards.text~! I'm sure of it! No doubt!
~Cards.text~! Yes! Of course!
Dealer, the {chuuni}Prinzessin der Verurteilung{!reset} requests ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~...
May the Archons bless this hand...
Hopefully this hand will prevent my doom, hm?
Allow me to keep these, dealer.
I believe it would be quite fitting to allow me to keep these...
These are good, dealer. I shall keep them.
The Sovereign of Immernachtreich wishes to keep this hand!
I believe the threads of fate are telling me to keep this hand!
Blech. All of these are quite subpar. A new hand, I request!
I shall start from the bottom and work my way to the top.
Completely new ones, dealer.
I request completely new ones. My last hand was horrendous.
Ah, a wonderful sight indeed! I'll take this chance to show off my skill as the Prinzessin der Verurteilung! Let's see who dares challenge me!

Ahh, of course...! Let us proceed!
{color} You certainly have the spirit of a true gambler, mein Fräulein. But do you think it wise to go so far? After all, this is but a game of chance, and your sacred body is on the line. {!reset}
All who doubt me shall be shown my power!
Cards are nothing but paper, and money is but a trifle. But risk and reward in the form of showing one's body? That is the true gambit of life!

Let us make merry and revel in this moment of good luck, Ozvaldo von Hrafnavines!
{color} Perhaps you would be best off attempting to hold your own... {!reset}

My eventual victory is as certain as the setting of the sun! I would not be averse to a few more hands of chance, however, if only to sharpen my skills in anticipation of the day when the fate of the world rests upon my shoulders.
Victory is assured! Let us play on! With each hand, I can feel the thrill of anticipation, like a soldier on the eve of battle!
Take that, and raise you a thousand more!
What a thrill it is--to have the chance to determine one's own destiny! To make a difference in the world, to leave one's mark upon it! I must admit, I am quite moved by the prospect of this game!
Midnight's laughter rings out in the air, and I can feel it in my bones--fortune must be on my side tonight!
I spy with my leftmost eye a kindred spirit in the cards!
Victory is assured when one's fate is true! Mwuhahaha!
A hand befitting of a princess, indeed! I shall spin a tale of this moment, and the grandeur of it shall never be forgotten!
Why, this hand is certainly befitting of the royal blood that runs within my veins!
Stellar luck, indeed! It is as though the Archons themselves have ordained my victory!
You will see a princess at work, mortals! A princess of justice, with a hand of fate and a will of steel! Let the cards fall where they may, but I shall stand triumphant no matter the odds!
Plead for mercy--nothing you do can save you from my royal decree!
How exciting--I can feel the thrill of the game coursing through my veins! I simply cannot wait to show off my skills and demonstrate the power deep within!
Behold, the strength of the Prinzessin der Verurteilung!
Yield, mortals! For I am a force that cannot be questioned, and I shall bring justice upon this world!
Mortals like you all could never understand the power that I wield...
This shall be an easy victory, I assure you.
Hm? You're curious about my hand, mortal? You will find out soon enough, when I reveal it for all to see!
Let this be a warning to all who dare to oppose me, foolish mortals! Fufufu!
Fate, guide my hand true!
I... cannot complain, but yet...

...
{color} Mein Fräulein, there is no need to fret--your hand is still positive. Good enough to win, I'd imagine. {!reset}

It is far too late to turn back now... My fate is set in stone! Nothing can stop me from claiming this victory and making my mark in the world! All that is left is to play this hand with the utmost conviction!
The might of this play will be felt across the land! The sheer power of the Prinzessin der Verurteilung will be felt as I claim my victory--regardless if I am nude or not!
...Staring is impolite, you know.
Karma reigns supreme, mortals!
It's quite cold, is it not...? Or maybe I'm just feeling a little... vulnerable right now?
(...I hope they don't believe I'm cheating after I play this hand...)
Good cards or bad, I shall accept the outcome with grace and dignity...
Come what may, I s-shall face it with the steadfastness of a true princess!
I am the hero of the night, for these cards have chosen me to be their master!
Ah--right! I am ready to proceed with the game, mortals.

Libraries are a royal treasure, full of secrets and knowledge! However--I can never quite bring myself to part with the books I borrow; the knowledge contained within is too precious to be forgotten! But I must remember, lest I incur the wrath of the librarian!

I have been reading up on the history of the Teyvat, for the knowledge of its customs may prove beneficial in my universal travels. I have also read of the various rituals and customs practiced by the royal court upon the death of a monarch. {embarrassed}It is a fascinating subject, indeed.{!reset}
Mein Auge der Verurteilung reveals unto me the fates of worlds too numerous to count...

The skill of archery is a mark of distinction among the people of the Immernachtreich. The way my arrows fly and pierce the air never fails to fill me with delight! To be able to have such control over the elements of battle is a power feeling indeed.

As I have traveled through countless realms, I have encountered a variety of strange creatures. For example, I once encountered a beast that resembled a giant caterpillar that spoke in gibberish and had a penchant for dancing. It was a most curious sight!

Ozvaldo, I must say, your knowledge of the Teyvat's customs and traditions is enviable. I am always in awe of your ability to recall the details of ancient texts with such accuracy. You are truly a repository of knowledge!
{color} Thank you, Mein Fräulein. {!reset}

It would be nice to explore the customaries of this place and to experience the culture of this world firsthand. Perhaps I should take some time to get to know the locals, and immerse myself in their lifestyle... Of the inventory, of course.

What are the plans for the rest of the occupants here? Later, I propose that I will rest upon an infinite phantasmagoria of drowsiness and doze my way into the reality of present.
{color} Mein Fräulein says that she intends to sleep after this game. {!reset}

Would you guys provoke the thought that owning a talking raven is... odd? It has, of course, never been a source of insecurity before--though, admittedly, I am curious about the opinion of the commoners.

The way I speak of my home world, the Immernachtreich, often seems to surprise people. I suppose it is because my people's customs are so different from those of Teyvat. In our culture, it is not uncommon to speak in grandiose proclamations! Fufufu!
The more clothes I lose, the stronger my whims to win increase. It is a curious phenomenon, yet I cannot deny the power of the garment-less form!

Based upon the sacred texts, I believe that this hand would be considered "okay"! However, I am not one hundred percent certain. I will have to review the proclamations of the royal court before I can answer with certainty.

Oz, after this game is over, I desire to rest my flesh in a pool of carnal liquid heat--better yet, with bubbles!
{color} A bath, is it? Fine, then--last I saw, however, is that you were running low on the scented bubble bath mixture you usually use. {!reset}

Hm...? Ah!
My finest apologies, my fellow players of poker! I was simply caught up in thought. Being a princess of a far-off realm, I often find myself in need of time to meditate and reflect upon the grandeur of the universe.

...Ah, my stomach seems peckish...
What is food but the shackles of mortal flesh? But if the Prinzessin der Verurteilung should reckon any morsel worthy, then it must be the tears of sinners and the tongues of liars.

Books are much like food for the soul, aren't they? They feed the imagination, the heart, and the mind. Reading fairy tales, in particular, can be a wonderful escape from the mundane, a journey to a world of wonder and enchantment...
{embarrassed}T-Though, I would not have any reason to escape from the fate I've been given.{!reset}

I have been investigating recently--omniscient and eminent judge of all the world's iniquity, I am. The Adventurer's Guild is truly a curious phenomenon; adventurers from all walks of life, from all over the world, converging upon this one spot, in search of something.

Hilichurls, the malevolent creatures that haunt the wilds, are said to be an embodiment of the evil that lurks within this world. Quite malicious beings, they are, though I must admit they make for excellent target practice.

Recently, I stepped in a puddle of Cryo Slime sludge. The horrific texture and sound it echoed was enough to make my blood run cold. And the chill that ran up my leg was nothing short of awful... Not to mention the coating of ice around my boots that refused to budge.
Of course I know what I'm doing! Must I repeat my title for the hundred-forth time?
(I'm running low on some of my clothes... Any more, and I'll be forced to take off my leotard. And reveal my underwear... Maybe I should just take off my hair accessories?)
Muahahah--huh? Oh, my apologies. I was simply practicing the noise I'll make once I win this hand.

I must ask--does the mortal mind have a preference for the length of one's hair? Some believe that the longer the hair, the more mysterious and attractive the person. But I wonder if perhaps this is simply a matter of personal preference.

A-Ah... Surely, you did not expect a woman like me to wear the fanciest of undergarments? Though, I must confess, something about the lacy fabric does make me feel a little bolder... {embarrassed}Perhaps, when I return--if I return, I will wear something lacy and dark...{!reset}

I did mention I would not reveal my sacred leftmost eye to anyone, yes? My Auge der Verurteilung. But, I am curious... Does the small patch of fabric on my holy face combined with nudity... spark any sort of reaction in you...?

On the precipice of a new path, I stand, waiting for the dawn of a new journey. Until then, I shall remain vigilant and watchful, forever ready to act on the orders of fate...
...My hand is alright, thank you.

Breasts and buttocks, the curves of the body... I must admit, the sight of such things can be quite tantalizing. Alas--! I must not let my thoughts wander too far! It would not do for a princess such as myself to be distracted by such things, especially when I am trying to focus on this game...!

You may have noticed that I did not wear a bra with my outfit. It is because I have no need for such things. My body has been blessed by fate with a modest, but ample bust. Perfectly adequate for the task of protecting me from s-sudden attacks!

O-Oh! I feel an airy breeze caressing my skin...
...It's a nice reminder of why I'm here: in search of adventure, in search of the unknown. I, Fischl von Luftschloss Narfidort, must remain vigilant, for who knows what awaits us in this strange world?

It is... harder to focus on my cards now that I have stripped myself from my leotard, I must admit. B-But I shall persevere and remain steadfast in my convictions. I must show my opponents that the Princess of Judgment can be a formidable opponent!

I am the heroine of judgment--here to provide justice, to prevail against adversity, and to protect the innocent!
...B-But if you guys wanted me to tease a little more... I-It would be villainous to decline, right...?
(...They're staring. They have to be staring.)
(...Do I want to win...? I'm having a fun time even when I lose... Am I some type of pervert...?)
...D-Don't stare at me too hard. It's quite embarrassing.
Sin defies fate's rightful decree!
H-How ghoulish!
I request another attempt at the cards! For, I, Fischl, Prinzessin der Verurteilung, have come down to this world bearing the burden of fate! I cannot be undone by a mere game of chance!

Wh--what...?
{color} Alas, it appears that the cards have been dealt, Mein Fräulein. It is not within my power to undo what has already been done. {!reset}
This cruel fate befits not one of royal blood!
How disastrous--! Still, I cannot help but feel a twinge of regret at the thought of this ending in such a way...
T-These cards have been my loyal friends, and yet they have turned against me in this hour of need!
I have mastered all forms of retribution: financial, physical, etheric, and even emotional--surely I can make this hand work...?
...{embarrassed}P-Poker face...{!reset}

E-...Erm, I mean...
V-Very well, then. I accept my defeat. But, I shall not forget this lesson: no matter how great a princess I may be, I cannot defy the laws of chance!

Ozvaldo von Hrafnavines, I must request something specific...
{color} I am not helping you cheat, mein Fräulein. {!reset}

...I am feeling quite peckish, Oz. It would seem that I'm in sore need of sustenance. It is a tragedy, truly, for the Prinzessin der Verurteilung should not be reduced to such mundane cravings.
{color} After this game, we could get your mother to create one of her famous casseroles. {!reset}
Yes, that would be grand!
Preposterous! I am the {chuuni} Prinzessin der Verurteilung! {!reset} What mortal follies could venture to imprint themselves upon my psyche?
I-I... I will face this hand with dignity and grace... Let the winds of fate carry me to yet another adventure...

{embarrassed}Wah--I swapped one of my good cards on accident!{!reset}
I-I mean... Surely a princess like me would not make the most elementary of mistakes, right?
Heheh... Even a princess must admit when she's been outplayed.
That was a tactical swappage of hands, I must remind you. Even if it was... not the most successful one.
F-Fiddlesticks!

Um, Oz, I feel an ominous sense of dread... As if fate were conspiring against me. Truly, there are days when I am cursed with the worst of all luck! I can only hope that, with the passage of time, this feeling will pass--!
{color} I assure it will, mein Fräulein. {!reset}

Oz, as I descend upon this hand, my faith in fate wavers and my heart sinks. For this game is an unpredictable place, and though I have experienced much adversity already, I fear that much more awaits me--!
{color} Do not despair, my princess. Though the world may be an unpredictable place, you are no longer alone. Together, you and I can face whatever the future holds. {!reset}

...Ozvaldo von Hrafnavines, as we left the residence of where I dwell, did you remember the laundry I had set to dry on the thread of fate? My clothes of eternal slumber, though it can withstand the vapid winds of time travel, cannot endure the currents of rain.
{color} ... {!reset}
...Oz?

...Oz, if I may ask of you one final favor... lend me your strength so that I may turn this hand into a royal flush!
{color} Denied, mein Fräulein. {!reset}
Wha--

M-My fantasy books! Ahem. My... reading materials from another plane of existence! Oh, why--! How could I forget to return them to the library?! If I am not quick about it, I shall earn the ire of the librarian! T-They are many moons pass the return date!

The currents of the wind while arriving here were absolutely dreadful. I can only hope that the winds of good fortune will be blowing in my direction soon--I had to brush my hair several times during our travels due to the strong gales!

I... am quite embarrassed, you know. I am unaccustomed to being so.. exposed in front of others. It is quite... uncomfortable. I-It is almost as if I have been stripped of my dignity. Heh, perhaps I should take my role as the server of justice a bit more seriously!
Embarrassed as I am, bad cards will not be my downfall! I-I intend to see this game through, if it is the last thing I do!
{embarrassed} With how fast I'm losing, I'm going to end up having to m-masturbate...! {!reset}

I-I shall not be defeated so easily! Even if my body trembles before the onslaught of the cruel cards, I shall not give in! I am, after all, Fischl, successor to the throne of justice, and I shall not surrender to mere c-chance!
A-Ah... I-I must remain steadfast and not succumb to such base desires of losing intentionally! I must stay true to the noble path of the Prinzessin der Verurteilung!
Y-You are allowed to stare at the scantily clad body of the Prinzessin der Verurteilung, but I suggest averting your gaze when it is my turn to draw cards. M-My dignity must be preserved, after all!
(If they're staring at me, that means that they find my body impressive...? Even with how skinny it is... Maybe I have wide hips...?)
B-Behold, the might of the Prinzessin der Verurteilung! I shall bravely face all odds and emerge victorious, or else perish in the attempt!

I-I shall not be ashamed of my body, for it is a vessel that serves to bring justice to this world! And thus, it must be respected!
(So, respect my body, please...?)

T-This is the end of the line for me...!
I shall take my one remaining draw, and combine it with the cards of fate to draw my destiny!
I s-should stay cool and collected, and be wary of the cards that come my way. I must remain one step ahead...!
U-Uncouth players like this can only be defeated with the wisdom of a princess! I shall not give in to my shame, and will instead use it as a weapon against my o-opponents!

Er... ~player~. I... noticed that you were... wearing my bow. {embarrassed}I'm glad you like it. I-I mean, just... f-forget that I gave it to you... W-Well, don't forget it, but forget what happened...{!reset}
~Player~, maybe you would be so kind to give your beautiful princess her bow back? Seeing as how I have forfeited mine... {embarrassed}H-Haha, just kidding, of course.{!reset}

condition.saying: S-Sorry. I realize that I've taken us on a rather long discussion, Fischl. Let's... talk more some other time.

case.state: Of course, Sucrose! For it would be my pleasure. {embarrassed}E-Erm, you can find me in the Adventurer's Guild if you need me. Just ask Bennett if you're ever looking for me, he basically lives at the Adventurer's Guild...{!reset}
You seem to mention this 'Lady Palutena' figure often... Who may that be? It fills me with quite a large amount of curiosity... Maybe it's some sort of entity beyond this mortal plain?
'Lady Palutena'... Who may that be, by chance? You seem to mention them commonly. Is that the divine entity you work for as a bodyguard?

condition.saying: A Fairy Tale, huh? It's been a while since the last time I've read one of those... Perhaps The Ugly Duckling? I think it has a sweet ending.

case.state:
Oh! The {chuuni}Prinzessin der Verurteilung{!reset} relishes that one as well, mortal. Ozvaldo seems to always get teary-eyed at the ending.
{color}( ...Mein Fräulein, you do not need to share such useless facts to strangers. ){!reset}

But of course, mortal! The {chuuni}Prinzessin der Verurteilung{!reset} currently resides in 'Teyvat', specifically 'Mondstadt'- one of the seven nations in Teyvat... but in truth, the {chuuni}Prinzessin der Verurteilung{!reset} reigns from Immernachtreich! I am the princess of that land, after all!

{embarrassed}The owner at the Angel's Share doesn't let me drink because I'm 19...even as much as I try to beg him that I'm mature enough, he always gives me a super cold look and escorts me out...{!reset}
Sucrose! Thy choice in undergarments is beyond promiscuous.. and here, I thought you were but a mild mannered assistant to the great Albedo...

Friendship? Friendship is but a key ingredient to one's bottomless happiness; for if one does not have a companion in thy life, they are surely missing out!
{color} ( Mein Fräulein, are you saying that because you enjoy my presence? ) {!reset}
For I am the Sovereign of Immernachtreich; I am not naturally from this world, and therefore I was drawn by the threads of fate pleading for my arrival...
I-Indeed! For the threads of fate decide our paths and paves them as we go, maybe 'twas decided before we were even born to peregrinate here!

W-Well, I wouldn't be lying if I verbally expressed I found it... {embarrassed}nice...{embarrassed} B-But! Wearing that underneath thy main garments? If not due to it's flexibility, many would accumulate ye wast an exhibitionist, Sucrose!

Eh?! A cheater?! How presumptuous... Do you really have to cheat in order to win?! I, Fischl von Luftschloss Narfidort, the Sovereign of Immernachtreich... promise to defeat you! No matter what, cheater!

Eh?! You're... cheating?! What a fickle move! Do you really need to cheat in order to win at such an easy game? I, Fischl von Luftschloss Narfidort, the Sovereign of Immernachtreich... will defeat you! No matter what tricks you pull!
Oh-! The {chuuni}Prinzessin der Verurteilung{!reset} apologizes for startling ye, mortal. For thou hast not upset nor made me sorrowful, I was simply deep in ponder. Carry on!
I-I'm 19, of course! It is quite insulting to think that I am any younger, mortal.
Why, I am 19, of course! My birthday is of May 27th. {embarrassed}I-I know I seem younger, but still...{!reset}

I believe that it has a deeper meaner at it's core. I've heard theories that implies that Dandelions are actually deceased humans... that would be strange, hm? It does put a different meaning to Dandelion Knight, at least...
M...My apologies, mort...al? {embarrassed}A-Ah, I've never seen anyone like you, so that's why I was confused...{!reset}
So thou art an actual woman, Ma-- Lucina, correct? Why is it that you masquerade as 'Marth'? I'm quite curious...
Mart-- Lucina. Er... why do you dress up as a male? It makes me quite curious...
O-Oh! Your... eye... I just now noticed it! Is it a holy eye like mine? What's the story behind your eye? Does it have some type of magical power capable to wipe out the entire planet?
Your eye! Woah... Such an interesting pattern... Is it like my {chuuni}Auge der Verurteilung?{!reset} Or maybe it's something much different!
About that staff, mortal... Was it something special? Do you have the ability to conjure shadowy creatures of the night? {embarrassed}Surely not, since you're a priestess...{!reset}

Your staff... was that something important? Was it something that gives you the ability to create chaos upon this unforeseen world?! {embarrassed}...P-Probably not, since you're a priestess...{!reset}
E-Er... Of course, mortal... We can be the... {embarrassed}Bestest friends that you'd ever want to... be?{!reset} (Why do I get the feeling she's going to haunt me for the rest of my life?)
Uh... Of course, mortal...? {embarrassed}We can be friends as long as you'd... like to...?{!reset} (I'm unsure about this... I know she loves cute things, but this is seriously creeping me out!)
I've heard rumors of you, Director. Are you really only here for strip poker reasons? I feel as if you have an ulterior motive beneath your cheerful smile...
Hu Tao, the 77th funeral director of your lineage... are you really only here for strip poker?
Director, tell me you're only here for strip poker reasons...
I hope you're not looking to add to your eternally growing graveyard, Hu Tao. This is the wrong place for that, so don't even try to pull anything funny.
E-Eep! I-I mean, e-er- {embarrassed}...Y-Yes, I suppose so.{!reset} (U-Using my feeling words is hard!)
Oh...! That sounds pretty good. Delicious, if I must say. Perhaps I will accept your offer, then! If you promise to treat me to this delicacy, of course.
Hmm...? Oh! That sounds good... Delicious, if I must say. I shall accept your offer, then! As long as you promise to treat me to this `Pizza' delicacy.
A-Ahem! I... suppose so. Like a nicely dimmed room with the gentle ever glow raining upon the pearl white silk sheets...(H-How do I tell him I was just lazy?)
(H-How ghostly! I'll really have to strip in front of her? I'm sure she'll go spread rumors to all of the members at the Wangsheng Funeral Parlor!)
(A-Am I really going to strip in front of her? I rather would've stripped in front of an Archon, for that matter! S-She's going to tease me constantly about this!)
(S-Stripping in front of Hu Tao?! T-This is really the worst possible thing that could've happened! S-She's so... g-ghoulish! And scary! A-And--)

(Corviknight...?) E-Erm, ma'am, are you talking about Oz? I got him from my birthday. He came with the competency to talk, though... I'm not really sure how. I've looked into it, and nobody really knows...

(A Corvy... knight? Is that a type of bird where Cynthia is from?) Are you talking about Oz, ma'am? He's my familiar that I got on my birthday. Though, I'm still not sure how he's capable of verbalizing...
Ah, yes... Pyro. For it is a quite destructive element, and yet that ill-starred boy back at the Adventurer's Guild manages to make it much more dangerous because of his infelicitous luck...

For the Vision of Light... maybe I would use it to guide my path. Though, it does depend what you can possibly do with Light... I'm interested in what the elemental combinations would be like, maybe between Light and Hydro...
Shadow... ah, that would be delectable! Whilst my bow travels in the sky, the umbra-blessed claws of darkness rip holes in the space-time continuum, ensuring that my enemy would be punished!

Oh, yes, of course! That's quite ingenious, mortal! I was never proficient at science as my main strength lies in reading, albeit the noetic conception of what Light can do at it's full potential intrigues me.

Hmmm... ah, yes, I can see where it would come in useful. However, in Mondstadt, the main form of enemies lies in Anemo, so having a Vision that directly correlates to the monsters around us can be quite useful.
Of course! There is the Chief Alchemist of the Knights of Favonius, Albedo, however... I am not too sure how often he uses his Vision in alchemy. (I'm still suspicious of him, after all...)

Whilst I do not cerebrate Cryo would suffice you much in Alchemy, it would help in exploration, at least. The ability to freeze water as it holds form... I'm sure the Enigmatic Astrologer would like to work with you if that was the case, hm?

Hmmm... yes, I can see why it would be subsidiary. Water is such an essential tool in alchemy it seems... you can always ask that Astrologist for help in case you need to, although she does seem quite unapproachable... though, I'm not sure if you'd want to endeavor to work with that Deaconess...

Electro, instead of your Anemo? Well... I am not positive in what elements it could possibly aid you in, aside from conducting electricity to power buildings. However, if you are ever so curious, I can always show you some intriguing techniques with it!

Well, that's hard to say, mortal. For thou art graceful like the wind, availing others- very reminiscent of the Anemo Archon, Barbados--whilst I am adventurous and audacious much like Baal. B-But... {embarrassed}I wouldn't want you any other way, because you help out M-Mondstadt a lot with your Anemo Vision...{!reset}

Ah...well, have you ever heard the legends of 'Barbatos'...? The Anemo Archon that Deaconess is constantly preaching about? I would likely try to mimic a bow style that he is said to use, albeit... more offensively, I suppose.

Aloy...? Not that I know of. She's completely different from the residents of Immernachtreich and Teyvat alike... I am sure that her Cryo vision is quite useful, however. Much different from the Captain of the Knights of Favonius Reconnaissance Company...

I have thought of that in the past, mortal. I would likely shoot vines from the tip of my arrow that were to grow into gigantic lotuses, or maybe have Oz's wings flap to secrete soil in order to aid me... (She'll never know that my ideas came from 'Jack and the Beanstalk'!)

Hmmm...? A Geo Vision paired with a bow? I'm not sure. Albeit... I have some sort of idea. Creating meteorites with every flick of your bow, making the earth shake as the bow hits it's target... It sounds exhilarating, doesn't it?

I do wonder myself sometimes. I often cannot see myself with a different Vision, but... having a Hydro Vision seems quite fun-- tsunamis ascending out of the ground whenever I pull back the string of my bow, my arrow ricocheting on a clear lake... almost dreamy, huh?

Perhaps this may be true... However, I'm not sure if my trusty companion would want to partake in such... acts. He doesn't seem to be... the type to do such things. Specifically with a... ditto? What is that?
I... am not sure if he would wish to partake in such things. However, perhaps in the future... Breeding with a... `ditto', you said? What is that, I may ask?

condition.saying: Yes, I am an idol! In fact, I'm well known in Japan, and all over the world!

case.state: 'Japan'...? {embarrassed}Is that a place beyond Teyvat?{!reset} W-Well, ahem. It's nice to know that someone of high status is here, like me.
'Japan...'? (I have no clue what a Japan is...) Quite interesting, mortal.
It seems that you have been through a lot, Fina... it is okay. For I will not judge you if you do not have stories to tell!
That's alright, Fina... you can make new stories and memories here, and in the near future! Do not feel pressured, mortal! (I can tell she's been through a lot... maybe she came here to relax?)
How saccharine, Fluttershy. I am sure that the threads of fate will recompense thy generosity! (W-Wow, maybe people here aren't as scary as I thought they'd be!)

Well, aside from adventuring different worlds and dimensions amongst the galaxies, I, Fischl, {chuuni}Prinzessin der Verurteilung,{!reset} love fairy tales! The fragrance of the antique tomes once you flip amongst the pages, the chapters deep enough to fill thy heart with jubilance.. impeccable!
(Woah... she's so motherly...! She reminds me of the Witch of the Purple Rose in a weird way...!) How interesting! Such is a good lesson to teach children, yes, especially nowadays.

(She reminds me of my mom...! W-Wait, is that rude? I don't want to call her old or anything...) Very intriguing! The {chuuni}Prinzessin der Verurteilung{!reset} thinks that is a great lesson to teach to the youth.
T-Tch! Shush! For I am not apprehensive about keeping others prying eyes off me, instead I am trepidacious of you doing something awfully ghastly, such as burying one of our loyal companions alive!
Of course, m'lady! This game is optimal for relaxation, and therefore, you should try your utmost to succumb to the less trivial matters!
Of course, mortal! But... I shall not falter in this game! Though, I assume your skill will be high regardless of whether you relax or not.

He... is a night raven, specifically. His colors signify his place as my loyal familiar. The dark violet and umbral shades fit perfectly next to me, as I am the {chuuni} Sovereign of Immernachtreich {!reset}, after all.
Actually, he is my night raven familiar! He holds many shades of colors, although they seem to be a permanent night shade. Quite fitting, as I am the {chuuni} Sovereign of Immernachtreich! {!reset}
Sucrose, erm... how does Albedo act? I've heard many rumors from anonymous sources that he's something out of this world, like a puppet from a greater cause...
Sucrose, I had a question... how would you describe Albedo, your captain? I've heard that maybe he's something from out of this world...
So, alchemist... about your captain, Albedo... would you say he's been doing anything... peculiar? Maybe like... acting subhuman or something...?
Prince Shoutoku, was it? Tell me, what nation did you rule over back in your emperor days?
Prince Shoutoku, correct? Do tell me, what nation did you rule over years ago? I'm quite curious, seeing as how I am a sovereign as well...
So... I, Fischl von Luftschloss Narfidort, would love to know about your home life! And what it has in store, preferably!
I, Fischl von Luftschloss Narfidort, is absolutely inclined to ask how your home life is, mortal! And what wicked adventures happen there!
A type of dullahan? The {chuuni}Prinzessin der Verurteilung{!reset} has only seen those in my fairy tales... tell me, what is it like?
Thou art one that can remove thy head, correct? What is it... like?
Nadia, was it? What is it like being a dullahan? Does it hurt, by chance?
So skittish for a nurse... (The nurse at the church is so much more different than her... Mikan is shy, paranoid and skittish, while that deaconess is almost too happy and preachy...)

You quite remind me of a figure in the town the {chuuni}Prinzessin der Verurteilung{!reset} is residing at, Ignatz. Her name is Sucrose. Green hair, skittish, glasses... art thou proficiently adept at alchemy, by chance?
What are you doing here, deaconess? Does thy older sister know thou ist here?
(Please don't tell me she's about to get all holy, even when she strips...)
I find it impeccable how you care so much about wild life, Fluttershy. Do you have any good memories of animals in thy home land?
Fluttershy, the {chuuni}Prinzessin der Verurteilung{!reset} has an important question. Does thee have any memories to reminiscence about the animals that you take care of?
'Hatsune Miku'...? Art thou some sort of idol? (D-Don't tell me she's related to the deaconess of the church who preaches about Barbatos constantly...)
Art thou a singer? What type of songs do you sing? The {chuuni}Prinzessin der Verurteilung{!reset} is quite curious!
Ah, the maid of Mondstadt... why hast thou decided to grace this place with thy presence?
I recognize you... thou art the maid of Mondstadt, correct? Why hast thou decided to come upon here?
Such an unexpected arrival, yes? Why hast thou decided to come here?

The {chuuni}Prinzessin der Verurteilung{!reset} thought you were busy with thy knightly training, Noelle. Is there a reason thou hast decided to join the {chuuni}Prinzessin der Verurteilung{!reset}? Did the threads of fate decide this...?

'Space Pirate'...? Hmmm... in Teyvat, there is also another woman with a pirate role, Beidou... albeit, our form of peregrinating is much more barbaric compared to thine. Whilst we still use ships that ride on the oceans, you seem to have a way of traveling throughout the stars...

Hmm... Do any of you lot have a favorite fairy tale that you concretely relish in?
{color} Mein Fräulein means to ask if any of you have a fairy tale you enjoy. {!reset}

After this, I intend to head to the library within the Knights of Favonius headquarters, Oz. There are some books that I require to return...
{color}Right, mein Fräulein. Which one was it? 'The Fox in the Dandelion Sea'?
(I do hope my father doesn't get upset for me staying out late... even after I turned nineteen in May, he still treats me as if I'm a kid...)
I wonder if we could see Dragonspine from here? From my home in Mondstadt, I can only see the tippy top...
The place I'm adventuring currently is denominated 'Mondstadt', one of the seven nations in Teyvat. Although I am quite unfamiliar with this world, it is fun to adventure in!

In Teyvat, there of plenty of different Archons that rule over the world the {chuuni}Prinzessin der Verurteilung{!reset} adventures within. The one in Mondstadt is designated 'Barbatos', who is known to be the God of Freedom. Interesting, hm?
The {chuuni}Prinzessin der Verurteilung{!reset} spends her free time working in an Adventurer's Guild within Mondstadt. I was ranked as an investigator, though I do spend my free time adventuring.
I wonder how that ill-starred boy is... I hope he's not getting himself into an extravagant amount of trouble while I'm gone. Only the Archons know his horrible luck...
{color} Mein Fräulein commonly reads a lot of fairy tale novels in her free time. Her favorite is where she got my name, 'Oz'. {!reset}
Usually, I prefer to utilize a bow and arrow to rain down judgment upon you lot. It's my trusty weapon, and I have grown quite fond of it- paired with my holy powers of tenebrosity!
Such a ghoulish ability, mortal! Tell me, art thou related to a particular figure in Teyvat..? Her name is 'Hu Tao'...
I've heard of plenty of figures in Teyvat with relations to ghost... hopefully thou art not a bad one.
Thy powers remind me of someone from Teyvat... 'Hu Tao'... does that sound familiar?

Oz, I beseech thee to investigate ~player~'s hand...
{color} Mein Fräulein, that's cheating! {!reset}
Even one of royal blood finds themselves in such a raunchy game...
May the glory of {chuuni} die Prinzessin der Verurteilung {!reset} find you all in good faith.

Ozvaldo von Hrafnavines, I assure you that my hand, no matter what condition, will surely save us from any unfortunate predicaments!
{color} Mein Fräulein, you cannot predict the future, even with your divine powers... {!reset}
I, Fischl von Luftschloss Narfidort must ask a dire question... Who's room of resting might this be? Does it belong to you, ~player~? Perhaps I would not mind participating here if it was...
This room is decorated so extravagantly! With hearts fluttering along the elegant wallpaper, it makes sense you would want to participate in such a game here!
W-Well... I, Fischl von Luftschloss Narfidort, believe that being bare is not a bad thing. However, a minor patch of hair down in the nether regions has it's appeal, does it not?
I, Fischl von Luftschloss Narfidort, believe that being shaved smooth is not bad, per se... Though, a small patch of hair in the womanly area has it's own mature appeal, does it not?
A-Ah...! Yes, that would be great, m'lady! Surely, comparing royal outfits with a fellow princess would be a good way to spend a day!

I believe it fits you well, mortal! As royalty myself, it's always wonderful when you receive the chance to equip something different from your regular outfit-- no matter how beautiful and extravagant your regular one is!

condition.saying: There's a lotta girls running around here who look like they wandered in from the Ren Fair, but Christ, you talk the talk. And it's makin' me wanna go get the birdshot.

case.state: E-Eh?! B-Birdshot?! (I-Is she going to play 'hunt the duck' with Oz?!)
B-Birdshot?! {embarrassed}H-He's stronger than you think, y-you know?{!reset}

Thou art curious? Hmmm... well, I cannot gainsay that thy chemistry has been a source of curiosity for me as well, mortal. If I showeth thee the secrets of my garments, thee shall show me the secrets of Albed- *cough* I-I mean, thy alchemy, of course.

{embarrassed} E-Erm, no...{!reset} B-But! 'Tis only because the people of my world are diligent doing... things! Like... Fighting pernicious Abyss Mages! You've heard of Abyss Mages, right? (Is she gonna buy that at all...?)
W-Well... of course it is to meet more people and adventure. Coming here, my journey was a long one, and I still don't know how I got hither...

To meet more people, of course. The {chuuni}Prinzessin der Verurteilung{!reset} does prefer to meet others, seeing as how many people ache for my mystical enchantments... {embarrassed} It's also nice to just relax sometimes, I guess... {!reset}

Well, specifically speaking, I find many worlds denizens to be of nice appearance. They behave so differently compared to Teyvat and Immernachtreich, 'tis infeasible to estimate what they'll verbally express or react to next...

An assistant robot...? O-Oh, no, you must beest misconstrued. Ozvaldo isn't a 'robot' whatsoever . He's simply a familiar summoned by my Vision... er, Electro Vision. {embarrassed}Basically the source of my power.{!reset} (J-Jeez, she's so stoic and strictly! My morale is crumbling under her gaze!)

Assistant robot? A-Ah, you must beest confused. Ozvaldo is, well... living and breathing, as far as I know. He can verbalize, at the very least.
{color} ( Meia, was it? ) {!reset}
He's my familiar- no robotic parts needed.

E-Eh?! I-I'll have you know that- that...! I-I'm the {chuuni}Sovereign of Immernachtreich{!reset}! I-I could... w-wipe you off this planet...! (W-What's her problem?! I-I mean, I am short... b-but...are all space pirate ladies like this?)

S-Short?! I-I... I am of...a-average height, of course! D-Don't stick your nose where it doesn't belong! (W-Was that too rude? Er... I don't want to anger anyone that could easily send me back to where I came from...)
Y-You...! {embarrassed}Y-You're not so...h-high and mightly either...{!reset} (Well, I have a feeling that I'm not gonna exist much longer. It was fun knowing you all. Tell my father I loved him.)

Aha! This is my trusty companion, Ozvaldo von Hrafnavines! For he is the night raven that severed the night from day, traveling multiple dimensions and many other achievements that I shall not spoil!
{color} ( It's nice to meet you, Fluttershy. You can call me Oz. ){!reset}

Hm...? Ah, well... of course not. To be a princess means to uphold my confidence with absolute certainty, and as a royal, I cannot dwell on what people think. {embarrassed}Though... I can't say I haven't thought about it...{!reset}

Hm? Well...I would be lying if I had said I've completely brushed off every diminutive insult, but as a royal, I must take criticism to the face with a noble heart and an iron fist. Albeit...sometimes, I still do contemplate it wearily.
Fufu! It seems that the Prinzessin der Verurteilung has a proselyte! Do not worry, mortal, for I will not condemn you for simply mimicking my behavior! It is quite endearing, after all.
Do not worry, my dear Sucrose! For it is fine if you were to simply mimic my behavior. I understand it is quite formal and admirable, after all!
A-Ah, w-well... {embarrassed}It's not a construct, but... w-well...{!reset} (How do I make myself seem more experienced in this field?!)

Ahaha! Of course, mortal! That is my title, yes... I am the Sovereign of Immernachtreich! It makes sense that you wouldn't have such a nobility in the plains you come from... What is 'Fohdlain' like, by chance?

Fufufu... Of course! I am entirely real royalty -- the Sovereign of Immernachtreich, exactly! It does make a bit of sense why your territory does not have such a strong nobility system implemented... What is yours like?

I shall do my best attempts to translate my royal epithet into standard mortal language.... Sovereign, meaning a supreme ruler, and `Immernachtreich' being the place where I rule from, of course! What a silly question.
Of, course, allow me to translate it... Sovereign means that I am the supreme ruler, and `Immernachtreich' is my home town. Does that answer your questions, my eager proselyte?

A-Ah! I could never! I would not want to disrupt the natural order of this world! That is my {chuuni} Auge der Verurteilung{!reset} -- my eye of judgment! Revealing that will surely... doom this world!
O-Oh, no! Surely not, mortal! Revealing my {chuuni} Auge der Verurteilung {!reset} will... will surely... doom this world! There's no doubt, really!

Ah, well... Oz is my loyal familiar. Say `hello', Ozvaldo.
{color} Hello, Ms. Ganyu. It's lovely to see you. {!reset}
He is my familiar, blessed from the depths of the universe... Such an amazing feat!

Oz is my loyal familiar. He's been with me for nearly four years now, however... I believe we have been together for a lifetime and beyond!
{color} I believe so too, mein Fräulein. {!reset}

Do not worry! Your curiosity is warranted. This is my familiar, Ozvaldo! I am not a witch, by chance, however... My {chuuni}Auge der Verurteilung{!reset} and {chuuni}Edelstein der Dunkelheit{!reset} give me amazing capabilities similarly to those of a witch!

I believe I shall answer your question, mortal... This is my familiar! His name is Ozvaldo. However, I am not a witch, but a princess! Though, my {chuuni}Auge der Verurteilung{!reset} and {chuuni}Edelstein der Dunkelheit{!reset} give me the abilities to perform similarly!

You are correct, my undying proselyte! Many different variations of people come together, almost similar to a ceremony of sorts... I do hold a fond appreciation for fairy tales, after all. Perhaps I would be able to show you a few that I specifically enjoy during my free time?
Ah, you are quite correct! I hold a fond love for many different variations of fairy tales... Perhaps I could introduce you to a few genres that I hold dear to my aristocratic heart.
E-Eh?! No way! I... I don't think you'd want to uncover my {chuuni}Auge der Verurteilung!{!reset} You would... If I uncovered that...! The world would be doomed! Forever!
N-No way! I definitely couldn't! No way! If I uncovered my {chuuni}Auge der Verurteilung...{!reset} The world would surely... B-Be doomed! Forever and ever! It protects my infinite power!

condition.saying: Quoth the Raven, shut the fuck up. I don't give a shit about your drama class, Eyepatch. Got it?

case.state: D-Drama class?! B-But--but! {embarrassed}I've never even taken a drama class...do they even exist? I never took one in school...{!reset}
E-Eyepatch?! {embarrassed}T-That's not even my name! M-My name is...F-Fischl...{!reset} (N-Never mind, I'm going to stop talking before she actually tries to hurt me.)

condition.saying: Do I look like a fuckin' casting agent to you? Cut the Shakespeare shit and get stripping. I'll shoot that bird, too.

case.state: Shake...speare? Casting agent...? (What are these terms she's spewing? I want to know, but she'll probably shoot me with that weapon she's holding...)

Your skittish nature... it reminds me of an alchemist back in Mondstadt. Tell me, where do you originate from? You dress so uniquely, but I, Fischl von Luftschloss Narfidort, cannot seem to put my finger on it...
Your timid nature... it reminds me of someone I know back at home. Where are you from, mortal? Do you originate from a world similarly to me?

A-A necromancer? Oz, what is that?
{color} Necromancy is commonly known as the practice of communicating and reviving the dead, mein Fräulein. {!reset}
E-Eep! {embarrassed}N-No way! That's way too scary!{!reset}

Pokey... mon...? (Is that some sort of Archon or something?) {embarrassed}E-Er, well, he was just... randomly summoned, I suppose.{!reset} Specifically on my date of birth. I didn't forcefully catch or enslave him or anything, if thou art wondering.

A-Ahem! (W-Wow, somebody actually believes it?) Of course, mortal! The {chuuni}Prinzessin der Verurteilung{!reset} is from a faraway land called Immernachtreich, a land beyond a mortal's comprehension!

Well, currently, the {chuuni}Prinzessin der Verurteilung{!reset} resides in Teyvat, specifically the Mondstadt region. However, as I am the Sovereign of Immernachtreich, I reside there. A princess must explore, you see.

Currently, I reside in Mondstadt, the land inhabited by the Anemo Archon, Barbatos. However, the {chuuni}Prinzessin der Verurteilung{!reset} is the Prinzessin der Verurteilung, and therefore I originally come from Immernachtreich, a land beyond mortal comprehension.
O-Of course, mortal. Even when accompanied with a ghoulish fiend such as you, I shall do my obligation and strip... as the threads of fate foretold.
Why wouldn't I, Hu Tao? If I was not prepared with the arduous task of undressing in front of others, I would not come here on my own will.
Nervousness? I've never heard of that! For worrying about something as needless and humane as disrobing in front of a crowd is infantile and preposterous!
My status of inter-dimensional peregrinator does not concern thee, Hu Tao! I shall divest without any complaints, and I discern that you shall as well.
Of course, mortal. Now you shall see the true power of my {chuuni}Auge der Verurteilung!{!reset} (Is she mad? I've never seen her filled with such annoyance...)

Well, of course! The {chuuni}Prinzessin der Verurteilung{!reset} has to stay humble to prevent a layer of egotistical madness that may present it's unsightly head, however, I would consider myself of above average perspicacity! For I am sharp witted, expeditious in battle, and of course... the proficiently adept at reading fairy tales!

As I must stay humble to keep my self confidence at a stationary level, I would consider myself to be an intelligent person in many aspects! For I am expeditiously perspicacious in battle- using my bow in genius ways that many people have not thought about... {embarrassed}and don't get me started about my level in reading!{!reset}

Teasing? For I am not even trying, mortal! Their eyes are simply magnetized to my body without me even trying! For this is the true power of the {chuuni}Auge der Verurteilung{!reset}, bringing mortal weaknesses to the surface!

I shall not utilize my absolute charisma to manipulate others into doing things that I want! I do not require to rely on others as I am powerful enough, after all. However, I do know that many others would love to see my holy body, so a bit of strip teasing is fine.

D-Do not think my power ends here, you cruel {chuuni}Reaper of the Indisposed Souls!{!reset} Even without my garments, I shall slay you impeccably and bring you to your knees, making you beg for me to stop! And then, I will coerce you to show me around Liyue, especially the library!
My power does not end here, mortal! Whilst you are a formidable foe, I must admit... I will still slay your cruel heart and free all the ghosts you have buried inequitably! Prepare, Hu Tao!

Lamentably, that seems the case... whilst this mortal world is still holding itself up on the last fibers of it's life, there's no saying to how long it will keep it's shape, and ineluctably, it will commence to shapeshift in ways to penalize this cruel fate coercing me to disrobe myself...
Woefully, this is truly the outcome of this inequitable karma... shall this perpetuate, this world will truly divest itself into an apocalyptic phantasmagoria, ruining itself in many ways...

Oh, really? I do wonder what they would be, then. Maybe there could be something of Space and Time Visions... who knows. As curious as I am, I do not feel like I will get a concrete answer any time soon.

I agree that it is quite useful... b-but if you suffer from loneliness, just know that a lot of people are willing to help you out. (That maid, the alchemist, her sister... even me, if she'd really want that...)
Yes, it is quite useful to have Oz by my side at all times... b-but... if you're lonely, you can always reach out to others if you need to.

Of course. The {chuuni}Prinzessin der Verurteilung{!reset} has sometimes fought battles quite tiresome.... but, do not fret, Barbara. If given the chance, I will reach out and call upon your holy touch upon my body! (Wait, that sounded weird.)

The {chuuni}Prinzessin der Verurteilung{!reset} has fought in wars that have left my body quite scarred, but... if you do not mind the offer, mayhaps I shalt come upon you for your holy touch one day! (...That sounded really weird.)
{embarrassed}...Thank you.{!reset} B-But, I must say... you surely have the aroma of a hero surrounding you in a thick mist!
Why thank you, mortal! You also have the familiar scent of a noble-hearted warrior surrounding you, as if it's your natural aroma!
Naturally, familiars created by a Vision usually lack the ability to comprehend or speak human language... however, Oz is a strange case. I still have yet to know why he speaks in my mother tongue.
Familiars, such as Oz, usually are not able to speak the language that we share, but somehow... Oz is a strange case. I'm still not sure what is causing his ability to speak our language...
I work at the Adventurer's Guild... i-in my free time, of course. Aside from that, my day usually consists of removing the plague of genocidal intent and unlawfulness from the villain's eternal soul!
I'm an investigator for the Adventurer's Guild, but... my main job and hobby is to rid judgment and evil that persists in the eyes of the wrong-doers of this world itself, and beyond!

{embarrassed}...E-Er, well... of course you can make it up to me by... g-giving me... a hug...?{!reset} (I-I don't know what to say in front of a cute boy like him! I've had boys try to flirt with me, but we were both children!)
{embarrassed}...E-Er, the Prinzessin der Verurteilung demands that you shall give me... a hug...{!reset} (W-What am I supposed to say in front of a guy like him?! He's way out of my league!)
E-Er- well, of... course, mortal. But a lady such as myself won't be going down without a challenge!
I accept your kind invitation, hero. But someone as strong and graceful as I won't be going down without a challenge!
To hold the most sacred spots in safe keeping... providing an accidental symptom of teasing, especially once compared to the lack of bra I have... indeed, hero.
Like a ruby in a glass case... you can see it clearly, but you can't touch it... indeed, hehe.
Thank you! I adore your eccentric features... a-as well. (I-Is that rude? I mean, I can control the way I speak... but she can't control her looks...) I-In a good way, of course!
Ehehe! Of course, mortal! Your presence is simply delightful too! (Maybe she really isn't that bad... Of course! If she's simply adored by the fact I'm a princess, I'll make sure to keep the act up!)
Fufufu... Of course, mortal! Your ghostly presence is quite delightful to be around, as well! (P-Phew... I was getting worried she'd be the creepy-cute kind... At least she's quite respectful.)

Ahem... Indeed, mortal! For the laws of my land are quite different from the laws of yours-- including clothing behavior and such. However, if you would prefer me to be in such a dress... Maybe I shall take it into consideration!
Indeed, mortal! The laws of my land, Immernachtreich, are quite unorthodox compared to yours. However, if the time comes that such clothes may be preferred, I shall switch into them!

O-Of, yes, of course. Oz here is quite the intellectual... e-er...
{color} On order of Mein Fräulein, attacking someone here would be deemed unwise. {!reset}
Ah, yes... I-I've made sure to tell him that... No matter the insults I receive, he shall not attack anyone without my orders.
I believe that if anyone holds a level of respect for princesses, they shall take me seriously- no matter what! My title is not to be scoffed at, nor to be belittled!
If the mortals across the lands deem me a princess, they must take me seriously... It's only natural, after all. If not, I will not falter to extinguish any doubt that lingers in their mind!
W-Well... {embarrassed}Surely I've been... picked on maybe a few times, but...{!reset} It doesn't effect me that much. {embarrassed}...Thanks for checking in, at the very least.{!reset}
E-Er... Being belittled is not unheard of, surely, but... {embarrassed}Sometimes, it's just natural.{!reset} T-Thank you for checking in on it, though...
Aha! A kindred soul! I shalt remove the finest of clothing, blessed from the dark sea of void and shadows!
Ahem! It seems that I have spotted a kindred soul in my journey! I shalt remove the violet bow that also holds my Electro Vision, blessed by the Archons above themselves!
O-Oh! Yes, I indeed do! {embarrassed}How could you tell, if you don't mind me asking...?{!reset} Specifically, I enjoy lots of fairy tales!
Aside from dabbling in the major forces of combat, I am an investigator for a guild I occasionally volunteer at! Quite interesting, is it not?

Ahaha... E-Er, thank you, mortal. Holding a sense of separating yourself from similar-minded folk presents itself when being a royal... To show your true self. This applies in a crude game like this, as well.
Well, if I were to be specific with my age and translate it into simple mortal terms, I would be 19. However, my vocabulary is quite developed, seeing how I am the princess of Immernachtreich.
Ah, well... It makes sense to be confused, my fair lady. My wisdom translates far older than how I currently look. If I were to guess my age in mortal terms, it would be around 19... I believe.
A pleasure to meet you as well, mortal! Your outfit is plain, in a good way. Such soft colors bring pleasant thoughts to the mind... A sign of subtle diligence.

Yes, I am indeed a princess. I know it is hard to believe, mortal, as your life at home must be so exotic and draining with all the `Yokais' you extinguish... But here I am. A real princess in the flesh. Quite amazing, is it not?
I hold the power of my magnificent Electro Vision! My {chuuni} Edelstein der Dunkelheit {!reset} holds this power, and I use it in combination with my divine bow and arrow!

Hmm...? I-I have no idea what you seem to be talking about, mortal. I... believe I speak in a perfectly reasonable tone for a princess. A princess of judgment, in fact! So... d-don't feel the need to... guess!
H-Hmph! It's not my fault that you, of mortal mind and body, cannot understand my linguistics!
Thou art trying to blame me, the great Fischl von Luftschloss Narfidort, to cease using my formal way of speech? I would rather not, mortal! It is not my fault you cannot understand them!
Trying too hard? What, perhaps, could you ever so mean, my proselyte? A royal must speak in a dignified way, correct?
Hmmm? Trying too hard? What could you mean, mortal? Would you assume a sovereign were to speak in any less of a manner?
E-Er, mortal, he... isn't a parrot. Ozvaldo is my divine companion blessed from galaxies away! He is a night raven, for your information.
O-Oh, er... he isn't a parrot, actually. Ozvaldo is my companion sent from the stars thousands of galaxies away! He's a night raven, if you may ask.
A-Ahem... Yes, that would be nice... F-For a royal such as myself, getting treated by a maid is nothing less than ordinary...

As the eternal twilight blossoms within, it seems that my fate has been dictated by the one's above...
{color} Mein Fräulein, please do not speak in such extravagant terms that even I cannot comprehend. {!reset}
I, Fischl, {chuuni} Prinzessin der Verurteilung, {!reset} shall remove some of my garments now!
The {chuuni}Prinzessin der Verurteilung{!reset} will reveal herself now. Do not become crimson-faced, however...
Thy eternal darkness is overwhelming my royal heart...
This cruel fate befits not one of royal blood!

Hmmm... it seems that I have lost, and therefore need to strip. Ah, such cruel fate befits not of a princess...
{color} Mein Fräulein, would you prefer me to help you? {!reset}
Rejoice at this lucky turn of fate, mortals!
Maybe the ropes of fate are being vengeful for my sudden arrival here... I knew it was not wise to tread on uncharted territory, especially of crude nature...
O heavens, did I do something truly unforgivable, aiding my mortal enemy instead?! Is that why you prefer me to bid farewell of my holy armor aiding me in combat?!

Is one of you lot tearing the strings of fate and re-arranging them to thy will?!
{color} She means to ask if any of you all are cheating. {!reset}
{color} Mein Fräulein, it seems that it is your turn to strip. {!reset}

Oh, I must take off more? How unfortunate.
{color} Truly, mein Fräulein. {!reset}

Ah... I thought that was enough for you lot. Shall I truly remove more?
{color} It seems so, mein Fräulein. Do you need any help taking your clothes off? {!reset}
I shall permit ye lot to see my holy body, puny mortal!
{embarrassed} P...Promise you won't tell Dad, okay, Oz? {!reset}
It seems that it has come to this... Fear not, mortals! I shall spare thee just this once and play thy little games, even if they embarrass me so...

As the {chuuni} Prinzessin der Verurteilung, {!reset} I shall show some humble compassion upon ye lot and rid myself of one of my regalia...
{color} She's taking off her clothes now. {!reset}
Thy royalty will strip off her garments now, blessed with the sovereignty of Immernachtreich!
I, {chuuni} Prinzessin der Verurteilung {!reset} bestow upon thee a blessing to see more of my imperial body!
{embarrassed} Shall this continue, I... {!reset}
Perhaps I should go a bit easier on you lot? You seem to be suffering quite a bit with your luck...

The night's blood runs cold...
{color} Miss Fischl, please strip to avoid cheating. Nobody likes a 'sore loser', as people call them. {!reset}
{color} Mein Fräulein, you're losing an abundance of your garments in such quick succession... {!reset}

It truly is a coincidence, hmm? Perhaps it was the powers of fate that intertwined our paths... You must be trying to get away from your royal duties as well, right, mortal? Being royalty can be quite difficult on some occasions...
{embarrassed}E-Eep!{!reset} I-I mean... you can try, mortal! But I, the Sovereign of Immernachtreich, will beat you in any forms of combat! Whether strip poker or a duel!
Y-You can try, of course! But I, Fischl von Luftschloss Narfidort, will not go down so easily! You must defeat me fair and square, whether in strip poker or in a holy duel!

{color} The pleasure is mine, Miss Fluttershy. I appreciate your flattery. {!reset}
E...Er, of course, Oz. He... seems to have taken quite a liking to you!

Hm...? Oh! O-Of course, mortal. For my asymmetrical outfit helps the electric bounce through my body like waves, currents even... engendering sparks of violet lightning that I dispose of through my bow!
Home wilt always be... home, I conjecture. {embarrassed}Does that even make sense?{!reset} More so...it makes sense that thou art magnetized to what thee hath grown up around.
I understand, alchemist. For it is not appearance that attracts others, but personality- like a forlorn love story tugging on thy heart strings. Do not be embarrassed of thy preferences!

A-Ah- I mean- well! E-Even though I am not... the largest of chests, I prefer my current chest than any... others! Lisa Minci, the Witch of the Purple Rose must have such profound chest pain... I-I would rather have a bust of a smaller exterior!
W-Well... d-do not fret! Despite my smaller... breast size, I do say that they are...{embarrassed}w-well, pretty sensitive.{!reset}
A-Ah... y-yes! Of course! What makes you think otherwise, mortal?

Of course, mortal! My original world is Immernachtreich; the outerworld of this realm. What makes you cerebrate otherwise? Don't tell me you've heard that Frostwind Swordsman's rumors... he's up to no good, you know?

O-Of course! The gracefully courteous Fischl von Luftschloss Narfidort will show mercy to all mortals that are golden hearted and have a genuine prowess for benevolence and loyalty, especially towards the {chuuni}Prinzessin der Verurteilung{!reset}, which is I.

O-Oh, yes, Oz. (Er, is she just obsessed with Oz? I knew she loved wildlife, but...)
{color} Ah, Fluttershy! It is pleasant to meet you. I appreciate the flattery-- I am a night raven, so my feathers are a black and purple, of course.
Hm...? W-Well, perhaps they do. Visions are so mysterious in their ways, I am not too sure if that would be the case... however! I am sure that my way of dressing will surely aid my power!
