Hmmm...? Maybe. At the very least, I do know that my attire gives me boosts, whether personally, mentally or physically! With my robes on, I feel ten times as vigorous as I am without them!

Well, of course, I cannot explain in terms that would allow you to understand... albeit, I shall tell you... for it is the land of the aeonian darkness, crowds of people slaying maleficent minds! It is something that you folk would never understand, unfortunately...

No, I didn't... what does 'Pokéball' mean, by chance? Is it some type of weapon used to slay formidable foes in combat?
{color} Mein Fräulein, maybe a 'Pokéball' is a type of food? {!reset}
I don't believe I have, mortal! What is it like there, by chance? I'm quite curious about several locations all over the world, including Teyvat itself.
Japan? Hmmm... I don't believe I've traveled there, in my years of exploring. What is it like, if I am allowed to ask? Is it beautiful? Filled with different types of creatures?
Ahem... Of course. Summoners from separate universes seem to share something in common, yes? Perhaps I could share some of my wisdom with you, mortal... Learn some of your tricks, as well.
Hum... I do wonder that myself. However, as the {chuuni} Sovereign of Immernachtreich{!reset}, I shall make sure my presence does not start a war of any kind -- believe me, I worry that myself!
I worry that myself, mortal. However, as I do hold the title of the {chuuni} Sovereign of Immernachtreich... {!reset} I believe my presence is completely fine here, yes?

Maybe that is true... however, I would not give up my vision for another one. I am jubilant with my vision at the current moment, and it aids me in many different ways, such as bringing Oz to my companionship.
{color} Hello, Sucrose. {!reset}
S-Shush, you belligerently confident fool! I shall not falter from thy words! Thy puny attempts of teasing me will go to waste!
D...D-Dedicated to what 'bit', fool? My acts of confidence are not a play! (O-Oh no, she's catching on!)

Pretend? What art thou verbalizing about, mortal? Of course I shall subject myself to the same torture you preposterous mortals have to bare! I shall humble myself and show my golden, sparkling heart filled with ecstasy and care for humans alike!

W-What a cruel form of mockery, Hu Tao! I shall n-not forgive you for this! I will recollect this day until the day of Teyvat's demise, and once I meet you at last in Liyue, I shall penalize your malignant words with my bow and utmost power!

D-Do not mock my embarrassment, Hu Tao! I shall punish you in the future for this... though, f-for now, I shall perpetuate stripping! Thou art fortuitous that I am distracted with this infantile game!

E-Eh?! T-They are not make believe costumes, Hu Tao! For this is my holy outfit, leotard and boots alike! I could not imagine a fate where I, Fischl von Luftschloss Narfidort, did not wear this uniform whilst slaying Anemo Slime and Abyss Mages alike!
E-Eh? T-Think fast?! W-Well, U-Uh- (A-Ah! She's great at putting pressure on someone, that's for sure!)
W-Well, uh- wait- I don't- (S-She got me! T-That ghoulish director!)

For the size may not be astronomically big, it is really the shape and sensitivity that is consequential. Do not feel insecure about your own chest, Hu Tao, for I am sure it has some qualities that makes it good as well!
I do not see the reason to wear a bra. I am not an exhibitionist, however it does not reward any type of comfort due to a... er, s-smaller than medium sized... bust.
E-Eh?! N-No way! Keep your perverted desires and fantasies to your own sinful mind, Hu Tao!
W-What?! H-Hey, no way! K-Keep that to yourself!
A...Ah! Why thank you, Leon! {embarrassed}I don't think everyone can pull off the... o-officer look without looking a bit goofy. So it means a lot.{!reset}
Why thank you, mortal. {embarrassed}I usually get the opposite statement since I dress so extravagantly...so it means a lot.{!reset}

Oz can be quite a mouthful, of course... His linguistic capabilities are nothing short compared to mine, however he lacks the ability of social awareness due to his issue of... well, not being a mortal.
Oz can be talkative, indeed... His stories are nothing short of embarrassing. It makes me question how good his linguistic abilities are compared to mine... Not to mention he lacks social awareness.
'Tis only the duty of the lawful princess, indeed... why, does the chestnut-haired humble hero need saved from something frightening?
It's my duty, of course... Are you perhaps in need of 'saving' as well, hero?

{embarrassed}E-Eep?{!reset} A-Ahem! I mean, of course. The warm embrace of the hero after saving him from what dangers lurk in the unknown... such is a befitting reward for the graceful princess such as I!
A-Ahem... the princess shall be enveloped in the warm embrace of the hero, snuggling upon a nice fireplace... delightful, isn't it?
Of... course. A delightful treat from the humble, brave hero such as you... {embarrassed}I-It would be nice, wouldn't it...?{!reset}
A treat from the brave-hearted hero such as you? It would be delightfully perfect... {embarrassed}...thank you.{!reset}
Even the simplest of men can be charmed by the princess of nirvana, can they...? How delightful... (To be flirted with at this state...! I-I'm afraid I'm going to say something really lewd!)
Another man has fallen for my beautiful charm? H-Hehe... (H-He's going to end up making me say something really embarrassing! I-I've never tried to steer flirts in my direction!)
The feeling of despair... To be alone in a cold universe, with nobody to comfort you... That is what I mean! I'm not sure you mortals could comprehend it, however...
The gloomy feeling of eternal despair and hopelessness on your shoulders... That's what I mean. However, I'm unsure if mortals can comprehend such a feeling...
E-Er... My apologies, really. My shock was not to disrupt your emotions, personally... Simply put, I'm quite interested by your species, and I would want to learn more.
Wh-- How rude and utterly morbid! Must you speak with a stick up your a-a-... behind, mortal?! I would be ashamed to call you my proselyte!
M-Must you speak so inarticulately?! You shouldn't be rude to a stranger you just met! I-I would be ashamed to call you my servant!

Ahahaha! You could call it that, yes. I, Prinzessin der Verurteilung am from the outer world Immernachtreich! It holds many similar formalities to what you seem to be describing, mortal. And what about you? Where do you reside?
Oh, yes! You could call it that. I, Fischl von Luftschloss Narfidort, am from the outer realm Immernachtreich! It seems to be very similar to what you may be describing. Where do you reside, mortal?

I'm not going to take off my eyepatch, fool. Do you really want this mortal realm to crumble underneath the enormous power of my Auge der Verurteilung? It holds incomprehensible power--more than a mind is possibly able to understand.

I merely assume you are curious about the bauble dressed around my obscured eye. It is the all-seeing Auge der Verurteilung, which reveals all that is true in the world. As to the question of why I conceal it... well, I can't be sure that the truth will always be what I want to see. {embarrassed}In a game like strip poker, I'd rather not have to exploit my abilities to win.{!reset}

The fabric I wear around my left eye is a symbol of the power I wield and a reminder of my duty as the Prinzessin der Verurteilung. To protect those who have no one else to turn to, and to help move fate forward in a positive direction. I must stay vigilant and never forget my purpose!
This is my Dunkelnacht Sakrament; my leotard adorned with only the finest of accessories for the Sovereign of Immernachtreich.

I, the Prinzessin der Verurteilung, hereby decree that all those who witness this blessed garment be graced with the power to channel their inner strength and tenacity in pursuit of the ultimate goal. The darkness shall be no match for those of such courage and resolve

L-Let this be a sign of my triumph over the tyranny of modesty! L-Let... this be a symbol of my liberation from the bondage of clothing! Let this be a r-reminder of my victory over the chains of propriety!

I-It is my solemn duty as the Prinzessin der Verurteilung to bestow upon all of you the proper offering of a glimpse into the depths of the world--and, if I am to be believed, the ultimate key to your e-eternal salvation.
